instructions.step: Lightly toast the peppercorns in a dry frying pan for 1â€“2 minutes until fragrant. Pour in the madeira and simmer until reduced by half. Add the beef stock and mushroom ketchup, bring to the boil then simmer until reduced by half.
Stir in the cream then simmer for a few minutes until thickened. Remove from the heat and whisk in the butter. Season with a pinch of sea salt.
